# arubacloud_kms (Data Source)

Reads an existing ArubaCloud KMS instance.

```terraform
data "arubacloud_kms" "basic" {
  id = "kms-id"
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) KMS identifier

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the KMS resource
- `endpoint` (String) KMS endpoint URL
- `name` (String) Name of the KMS resource
